long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
‚≠ê Easy to use Ad blocker, nothing to configure, it just works.
üö´ Blocks and automatically closes most annoying popup advertisements.
ü•∑ Not detected by (Youtube) anti-adblock script.

For the full list or urls that we block, you can consult our official page: ezadblocker.site

Why EZ Blocker and not ublock (or other ad blocker) ?
Because almost all other popup blocker are detected as Ad blockers. Youtube now blocks ad blockers and many other sites as well. EZ Blocker is not detected on Youtube.

To better understand which websites we need to block, we record anonymous data about your browsing, keeping only the top level domain (never the full url) and a maximum of 50 per user.

‚úì Permissions: Default permissions is required on every website to effectively block ads and close popup advertisement.

üöÄ About
We monitor new urls of ad networks 24/7 and add them to our list every day. If you find that an ad or popup is not blocked, just wait 24h, it should be solved.

Change log :
2024.11.19 : Removed remote updating of scripts.
2024.10.23 : Moved scripts into local files directly into local storage upon install. Updated blocking list.
